description:
VPNs aren’t just useful for keeping your online activities safe and private, they’re also a great way to bypass restrictions on streaming content in other countries. The top VPN providers work hard to stay one step ahead of streaming services in a never-ending cat-and-mouse game, ensuring that you always have access to your favorite content no matter where you are. I’ve thoroughly tested the top VPNs on the market to see how they fare at unblocking streaming sites and curated a list of the very best below.

If you’re looking to use your VPN for more than streaming, be sure to check out my comprehensive roundup of the best VPNs in all categories, as well.
title: Best 5 VPNs for streaming Netflix and other services
